transArray.content:
The hotel room is not very big, but it is very new. There is also a small robot that automatically goes upstairs to deliver goods, which is very technological.
There is a small bar in the lobby on the first floor with coffee and orange juice, which is very good~
Dear guests: Hello! Thank you very much for your review. Your satisfaction is our greatest motivation. We look forward to your visit again and wish you a happy life.
